mapper.select: SELECT a.I_HOST,a.i_user, a.COUNTRY, a.C_LAT,a.C_LNG, a.ADDR, a.S_LAT, a.S_LNG, a.b_room, a.BED_TYPE, a.BED_QTY, a.BTH_ROOM, a.r_vastion, a.ROOM_TITLE, b.i_user as host_i_user,b.E_MAIL, b.NM, b.PRO_IMG, b.PH, b.r_dt, c.typ, c.live_type, d.requier, d.aircon, d.sampoo, d.hiter, d.in_hiter, d.wifi, d.breakfast, d.hanger, d.iron, d.hiar_dry, d.place_lattop, d.tv, d.baby_bad, d.baby_chairs, d.self_checkin, d.self_bth_room, d.piano, d.door, f.fire_emble, f.carbon_alarm, f.madic_kit, f.fire_exting, f.bad_lock, g.liviroom, g.cooking, g.waching, g.drying, g.paking, g.gym, g.swim_pool, g.jacuzzi, h.EXPA, h.room_info, h.loca_info, h.traf_info, i.child_ok, i.y_ch_ok, i.smoking, i.animal_ok, i.party, j.stairs, j.noise, j.animal, j.in_pking, j.public_space, j.plant, j.cctv, j.weapon, j.denger_dog, k.checkin_t, k.finich_t, k.ieast_day, k.max_day, k.reser_date, k.reser_end_t, l.FEE, l.Sale, l.W_SALE, l.M_SALE, m.cmtCount, m.comtAvg FROM host_user a INNER JOIN t_user b ON a.i_user = b.i_user INNER JOIN Build_type c ON a.i_host = c.I_HOST INNER JOIN FACILITE d ON a.i_host = d.I_HOST INNER JOIN SAFE_PLANT f ON a.I_HOST = f.i_host INNER JOIN GEST_SPACE g ON a.i_host = g.I_HOST INNER JOIN SPACE_INFO h ON a.i_host = h.i_host INNER JOIN room_rule i ON a.i_host = i.i_host INNER JOIN room_dt_rule j ON a.i_host = j.i_host INNER JOIN check_inout k ON a.i_host = k.i_host INNER JOIN room_fee l ON a.i_host = l.I_HOST left JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(i_contents) AS cmtCount, i_host, round(avg(ifnull(evaluate_val,0)),2) AS comtAvg FROM host_review GROUP BY i_host ) m ON a.i_host = m.i_host WHERE a.i_host = #{i_host}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO user_reser(I_HOST,I_USER,CHECK_IN,CHECK_OUT,GEST_QTY, TOTAL_FEE,CARD_USER_NM,CARD_NUM,YM, CVV,ZIP_CODE,COUNTRY) VALUES(#{i_host},#{i_user},#{chin},#{chout},#{qty}, #{total_fee},#{card_user_nm},#{card_num},#{ym}, #{cvv},#{zip_code},#{country})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

INSERT INTO aircnc_msglist(I_RESER,I_HOST,MS_TITLE) VALUES(#{i_reser},#{i_host},#{ms_title})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO aircnc_msgUsers( i_mlist, i_host, i_user ) VALUES(#{i_mlist},#{i_host},#{i_user})
mapper.select: SELECT a.i_mlist,a.i_reser,b.i_user,a.ms_title,DATE_FORMAT(a.r_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') AS r_dt, b.I_HOST,c.IMG_URL FROM aircnc_msglist a INNER JOIN aircnc_msgUsers b on a.i_mlist = b.i_mlist INNER JOIN ( SELECT i_host, img_url FROM rooms_img GROUP BY i_host ) c ON a.I_HOST = c.I_HOST WHERE b.i_user = #{i_user};

SELECT a.I_RESER, a.I_HOST, a.i_user ,b.ROOM_TITLE, a.check_in AS chin, a.check_out AS chout , c.img_url , d.live_type ,b.BED_QTY, b.BTH_ROOM,a.total_FEE,a.GEST_QTY AS qty FROM user_reser a INNER JOIN host_user b ON a.I_HOST = b.i_host INNER JOIN ( SELECT i_host,img_url FROM rooms_img GROUP BY i_host ) c ON b.I_HOST = c.i_host INNER JOIN build_type d ON b.i_host = d.I_HOST WHERE a.I_RESER = #{i_reser} AND a.i_user = #{i_user};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_rsv_cancel (i_host, i_user, i_reser, reason) VALUES(#{i_host},#{i_user},#{i_reser},#{reason})
mapper.select: SELECT a.I_RESER, a.i_host, a.i_user , a.check_in AS chin, a.check_out AS chout, a.gest_qty AS qty , a.total_FEE , b.addr, b.BED_QTY, b.BTH_ROOM, b.ROOM_TITLE, c.fee, d.live_type, e.img_url FROM user_reser a INNER JOIN host_user b on a.i_host = b.i_host INNER JOIN room_fee c on a.I_HOST = c.I_HOST INNER JOIN build_type d on a.i_host = d.i_host INNER JOIN ( SELECT i_host,img_url FROM rooms_img GROUP BY i_host ) e ON e.I_HOST = a.i_host WHERE a.I_RESER = #{i_reser} AND a.i_user = #{i_user}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_RSV_CHANGE (i_host, i_user, i_reser, chin, chout, gest_qty,total_fee, be_chin, be_chout, be_gest_qty, be_total_fee) SELECT i_host,i_user,i_reser, #{chin}, #{chout}, #{gest_qty}, #{total_fee}, check_in, check_out, gest_qty, total_fee FROM user_reser WHERE I_RESER = #{i_reser} AND i_user = #{i_user}
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS( SELECT * FROM check_inout WHERE i_host = #{i_host} AND DATE(#{chin}) BETWEEN reser_date AND reser_end_t AND DATE(#{chout}) BETWEEN reser_date AND reser_end_t )
